title: Citizen soldier
creator_credit: Greg Reading, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Telemark Productions
brief_description: An impression of the life throughout the year of a citizen soldier in the Citizens Military Forces. It delves into such aspects as how effective CMF training really is, why it is important to the individual and the country and what it offers to the soldier and to his employer.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Reading, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Telemark Productions
description: An impression of the life throughout the year of a citizen soldier in the Citizens Military Forces. It delves into such aspects as how effective CMF training really is, why it is important to the individual and the country and what it offers to the soldier and to his employer.
